24.title: 1916: First Chapters Collection
24.description:
These are first chapters to books first published in 1916.  Following is a tentative list culled from Wikipedia's article on the year in Literature; most of the works are to be found on Project Gutenberg,:Sherwood Anderson - Windy McPherson's Son
Henri Barbusse - Under Fire (Le Feu)
https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/12904
https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/48212  French
L. Frank Baum - Rinkitink in Oz
Edgar Rice Burroughs - The Beasts of Tarzan
Alfred Döblin - The Three Leaps of Wang Lun (Die drei Sprünge des Wang-lun, dated 1915)
Walter Flex - Der Wanderer zwischen beiden Welten ("The Wanderer between Two Worlds")
Charlotte Perkins Gilman - With Her in Ourland
Ellen Glasgow - Virginia
Sarah Grand - The Winged Victory
Louis Hemon - Maria Chapdelaine
William Dean Howells - The Leatherwood God
James Joyce - A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man
Franz Kafka - The Metamorphosis 
Grace King - The Pleasant Ways of St. Medard
https://archive.org/details/pleasantwaysstm01kinggoog
Ring Lardner - You Know Me Al
Benito Lynch - The Caranchos of Florida -Spanish
https://archive.org/details/3399803
George Moore - The Brook Kerith: A Syrian Story
https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/12821
Baroness Orczy - Leatherface
https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/40500
May Sinclair - Tasker Jevons
https://archive.org/details/taskerjevonsreal00sincuoft
Rabindranath Tagore - The Home and the World (ঘরে বাইরে, Ghôre Baire)
https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/7166
Booth Tarkington - Seventeen
Mark Twain - The Mysterious Stranger (completed posthumously)
Mrs Humphry Ward - Lady Connie
https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/13501
H. G. Wells - Mr. Britling Sees It Through - Summary by Matt Pierard
